players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I have important information: Bob is the mafioso. We must vote to arrest him now to protect the town."
You: "Charlie, that's a serious accusation. Can you explain why you think Bob is the mafioso? We need solid reasons before we vote."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and confirmed he is the mafioso. We can't afford to waste time doubting—arresting Bob now is the only way to keep the town safe."
You: "Charlie, your claim is strong if true, but only a detective can investigate, and you haven’t said you are the detective. Bob, do you have anything to say in your defense?"
